description:
Tree pruning in the Barnsbury Conservation area
Notification has been received of the intent to carry out the following tree pruning works:
X1 Sycamore - Crown reduce by up to 25%
site_name: Land At Brooksby Mews Strip Of Land Rear Of 38 - 62 Brooksby Street
decision_conditions: While the notification of intent to prune the Sycamore tree has been permitted ( not been refused) by the local authority, the pruning of the trees is a civil matter between the applicant and the tree owner. It is strongly advised that the written permission of the tree owner be obtained prior to any works to the tree that do not overhang the boundary of the rear garden of 60 Brooksby Street.  This is  a civil matter for the two parties to address, should this matter not be resolved within the next two years, notification would need to re submitted to the authority.
